item.title: Testing Ghost features
item.description:
Code snippets: MOV R3, #0xDEAD.

Subheadings

italics & bold, a list:

  • Item number one
  • Item number two
    • A nested item
  • A final item

or with numbers!

  1. Remember to buy some milk
  2. Drink the milk
  3. Tweet that I remembered to buy the milk, and drank it

Sub-subheadings

URL, like http://irfansharif.
item.dc:creator: Irfan Sharif
item.content:encoded:
Code snippets: MOV R3, #0xDEAD.

Subheadings

italics & bold, a list:

  • Item number one
  • Item number two
    • A nested item
  • A final item

or with numbers!

  1. Remember to buy some milk
  2. Drink the milk
  3. Tweet that I remembered to buy the milk, and drank it

Sub-subheadings

URL, like http://irfansharif.com - it'll automatically be linked up. Customised anchor text, here's a link to my personal website.

Images

URL of the image you want to include in your article

Descriptive placeholder and keep writing.

Quoting

Ghost - Just a blogging platform

Working with Code

Write inline <code> blocks really easily with back ticks. 4 spaces of indentation for something more comprehensive:

.awesome-thing {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
}

Ready for a Break?

Throw 3 or more dashes down on any new line and you've got yourself a fancy new divider

Advanced Usage

you can write plain old HTML and it'll still work! Very flexible.
